blockExtEnable.name: Enable removable block devices to display extension emblem icons
blockExtEnable.name[zh_CN]: 启用可移动块设备显示文件扩展角标
blockExtEnable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否启用块设备显示文件扩展角标
blockExtEnable.description: It's used to control whether to enable block devices to display extension emblem icons is enabled

dfm.system.emblem.hidden.name: Hide defualt system icons
dfm.system.emblem.hidden.description[zh_CN]: 该配置项用于配置是否隐藏系统默认角标,true代表隐藏，false代表不隐藏。
dfm.system.emblem.hidden.description: It's used to control whether to hide defualt system icons
